sections.heading: This third party embed for Google Maps is being blocked
sections.body:
```markdown
## Summary

To load the Google Maps service, user consent is required. Please click **'Accept'** to enable this third-party feature. 

### Important Note
The website owner must include this service in their Cookie Policy and Consent Tool questionnaire within their Termageddon account. After adding the service and submitting, it will load based on user consent choices.

### More Information
```
